participant_1.background:
My family are avid cyclists as well
I'm a farmer who likes to pickle eggs and horseback ride in my spare time.
I'm not sure of my current weight, but I'm working on it.
I enjoy long drives in the countryside and sometimes I spot my neighbour's pool boy.
I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.

participant_2.background:
I like to use my creativity to make unique and interesting items from thrift shop finds.
i start my senior year of high school next week.
I think it's really cool to be able to build things with your own hands.
i want to be a doctor when i graduate.
I'm learning a lot about myself through my studies and my experiences in the water.

content.text: I'm doing great! How about yourself?
I'm doing well. I'm a farmer and I like to pickle eggs in my spare time. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to use my creativity to make unique and interesting items from thrift shop finds. I also enjoy swimming and scuba diving.
That's really cool! I've never been scuba diving before, but it sounds like it would be a lot of fun. What do you like most about it?
I love being able to explore the underwater world and see all the amazing creatures that live there. It's also a great way to get exercise.
That's awesome. I'm glad you enjoy it. I'm not sure if I'm brave enough to try it, but it sounds really cool.
It's definitely worth trying if you get the chance. It's an amazing experience.
I'll keep that in mind. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. Have you ever tried making anything with thrift shop finds?
No, I haven't. I've always been interested in it, but I've never had the time to try it.
You should definitely give it a try. It's a lot of fun and you can make some really cool things.
I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem. It's always nice to meet new people who share similar interests.
Me too. I'm glad we met.
